This is mainly useful for the users of a russian social network VK.

VKHelper aims to help clean up the news feed of the app, including the following

+ Remove VK ads
+ Remove posts promoted by VK
+ Remove posts by communities which are labeled as ads
+ Remove the suggested friends news feed block
+ Remove posts labeled as those "you may find interesting" by VK
+ Remove the story camera left swipe gesture

Configure options from Settings.

* Now works on VK app clones and mods as well (edited filter plist) * Fixed filtering logic in the new engine that caused comments or other entities to disappear + Fix bug where list views (e.g. Video list) would suddenly stop working when Community Adblock is enabled
+ New render filtering engine that allows to flexibly filter any kind of ads and posts, just need the GUI coded, so coming soon...
